<Heading
  as={"h1"}

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/auth/mfa/totp/verify"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Verify TOTP code during login to complete MFA authentication.
Requires a `partial_token` from the initial login response.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
